## DiffValue type

A JSON-like value that can be diffed/patched.

Includes primitives (`null`<!-- -->, `boolean`<!-- -->, `number`<!-- -->, `string`<!-- -->), objects, and arrays.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type DiffValue = null | boolean | number | string | DiffObject | DiffArray;
```
**References:** [DiffObject](doc/markdown/./base.diffobject.md)<!-- -->, [DiffArray](doc/markdown/./base.diffarray.md)
